relationships.description: Acosta helped Epstein avoid prison while serving as prosecutor

analysis.summary: This Virgin Islands Daily News newspaper from February 27, 2019, covers multiple local stories including a significant report on how Alexander Acosta, before joining Trump's Cabinet, helped Jeffrey Epstein avoid a life prison sentence, described as a 'perversion of justice'.
